catalog_info.title: Combinatorics
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: The ability to read and write mathematical proofs. Some familiarity with group theory such as can be found in Math 122.
catalog_info.description: An introduction to counting techniques and other methods in finite mathematics. Possible topics include: the inclusion-exclusion principle and Mobius inversion, graph theory, generating functions, Ramsey's theorem and its variants, probabilistic methods.
